mapper.update: UPDATE BPM_SOL_USERGROUP SET GROUP_NAME_=#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOL_ID_=#{solId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_DEF_ID_=#{actDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_TYPE_=#{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_ID_=#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_NAME_=#{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTING_=#{setting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_=#{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, NOTIFY_TYPE_=#{notifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_=#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME_=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY_=#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME_=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE ID_=#{id}
